lead_paragraph: The former Ohio State tailback Maurice Clarett was indicted yesterday on new charges related to a highway chase and violent struggle with the police. Clarett, who was found with four loaded guns in his sports utility vehicle, was indicted on five charges that included carrying a concealed weapon and two counts of failure to comply with an order from a police officer. He will be arraigned Monday.
